import './infoslider.css' import './APIcode.js' let people = { } let slideLocat = 0 const apiurl = "https://api.sampleapis.com/rickandmorty/characters" async function getdata(){ fetch(apiurl) .then(response => response.json()) .then(function(data){ console.log(data[slideLocat]) people = data[slideLocat] }) .catch(error => console.log("Failed To Connetct To API!!!")) } getdata() function InfoSlider(){ return(

Rick and Morty

Rick and Morty PokeDex thingy 9000x

Name : Rick

X

Fact A : Info A

Fact B : Info B

Fact C : Info C

Fact D : Info D

Fact E : Info E

) } export default InfoSlider
